display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (NREM): Apneas with >= 3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and with >= 3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal / hour of NREM sleep from type II polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events
calculation: 60 * ( hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + canbp3 + canop3 + oanbp3 + oanop3 ) / ( slpprdp - minremp )
